response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es keine gesetze, die uns vor dieser art von datensammel-manie schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there no laws that protect us from this kind of data collection mania? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal information without proper regulations or protections in place. it uses hashtags to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
